metadata.note: JP-US cross-market supply chain and competitive links. Updated at Phase 9.5.

links.information_flow: US semi capex guidance -> JP equipment order trajectory
catalyst_links: LRCX/AMAT quarterly capex guidance is leading indicator for TEL orders
TSMC/Samsung capex announcements affect both simultaneously

links.information_flow: AMAT quarterly results -> TEL demand outlook validation
catalyst_links: AMAT China revenue restrictions create share shift opportunity for TEL
Shared exposure to TSMC advanced node expansion

links.information_flow: KLAC inspection demand -> Advantest test demand (sequential in fab flow)
catalyst_links: HBM test demand driven by NVIDIA Blackwell/Rubin ramp benefits Advantest directly
KLAC yield management data provides leading signal on fab utilization

links.information_flow: US defense budget/F-35 production rate -> MHI licensed production volume
catalyst_links: GCAP (Global Combat Air Programme) progress affects MHI next-gen fighter timeline
RTX Patriot/SM-3 co-production with MHI creates shared order book
Japan defense budget growth (2% GDP target) parallels US $1.01T budget

links.information_flow: LMT F-35 production rate -> MHI FACO assembly volume
catalyst_links: F-35 Block 4 TR-3 delays affect MHI delivery timeline
Japan GCAP vs F-35 follow-on creates competitive dynamic
LMT PAC-3 orders correlate with MHI missile defense demand

links.information_flow: Pratt & Whitney (RTX) engine delivery -> KHI component supply schedule
catalyst_links: KHI produces components for Pratt & Whitney engines (supplier relationship)
Japan P-1/C-2 domestic engine development vs RTX engine imports
KHI submarine/defense vessel orders track Japan-US defense alignment

links.information_flow: ROK North America factory automation orders -> Fanuc global demand signal
catalyst_links: US reshoring/nearshoring capex drives both companies' order books
ROK quarterly automation orders leading indicator for Fanuc NA demand
Humanoid robotics development creates new competitive frontier

links.information_flow: ROK automation backlog -> Yaskawa servo/drive demand outlook
catalyst_links: Yaskawa servo motor dominance in robotics joints (complementary to ROK PLCs)
Both benefit from EV/battery factory automation wave
China factory automation recovery affects Yaskawa more directly than ROK

links.information_flow: KLAC wafer inspection trends -> Lasertec mask inspection demand
catalyst_links: Lasertec EUV mask inspection monopoly (100% share) vs KLAC wafer inspection
EUV adoption rate at TSMC/Samsung drives both companies
High-NA EUV introduction creates step-change demand for Lasertec

links.information_flow: BWXT naval reactor orders -> JSW nuclear vessel demand signal (different markets but shared nuclear renaissance theme)
catalyst_links: Global nuclear renaissance benefits both (JSW: commercial reactors, BWXT: naval + SMR)
JSW is one of few companies globally that can forge large nuclear pressure vessels
SMR component demand could create new overlap between JSW and BWXT supply chains

links.information_flow: PANW threat intelligence/market trends -> NEC Japan cybersecurity demand
catalyst_links: Japan Active Cyber Defense legislation drives NEC government cybersecurity orders
PANW enterprise cybersecurity trends indicate global threat landscape evolution
NEC and PANW compete in APAC enterprise cybersecurity market

links.information_flow: CRWD breach data/threat trends -> Japan cybersecurity urgency indicator
catalyst_links: CRWD global threat reports drive Japan government cybersecurity spending
NEC endpoint security competes with CRWD in Japan enterprise market
Post-CRWD July 2024 outage, Japan enterprises diversifying toward domestic solutions

links.information_flow: CEG nuclear PPA deals (Microsoft) -> TEPCO Kashiwazaki-Kariwa restart value signal
catalyst_links: CEG-Microsoft nuclear PPA sets precedent for Japan hyperscaler nuclear deals
TEPCO Kashiwazaki-Kariwa restart timeline is key catalyst (7.0GW capacity)
US nuclear renaissance sentiment lifts Japan nuclear utility valuations

links.information_flow: VST nuclear asset repricing -> Kansai EP nuclear fleet revaluation signal
catalyst_links: VST Comanche Peak nuclear valuation surge signals undervaluation of JP nuclear fleet
Kansai EP has Japan's highest nuclear restart ratio (7 of 11 reactors restarted)
US data center power demand trends apply to Japan DC buildout

links.information_flow: GEV grid equipment orders/backlog -> Hitachi Energy grid demand outlook
catalyst_links: Hitachi Energy (via ABB acquisition) and GEV compete in global grid equipment
US grid modernization ($65B IRA) and Japan grid upgrades create parallel demand
Transformer shortage globally benefits both companies

links.information_flow: NVDA GPU demand/Blackwell ramp -> TOWA compression mold equipment orders
catalyst_links: TOWA compression mold equipment is critical for HBM packaging (SK Hynix/Samsung)
NVDA Blackwell/Rubin ramp directly drives HBM demand -> TOWA order flow
TOWA's 80%+ market share in compression mold makes it de facto NVDA supply chain

links.information_flow: PANW platformization strategy -> Trend Micro competitive positioning signal
catalyst_links: PANW platformization strategy pressures Trend Micro's point-solution model
Trend Micro's Vision One platform competes directly with PANW Cortex XSIAM
Japan enterprise cybersecurity regulation creates protected domestic demand for Trend Micro
